title: How to Draw a Cucumber

steps.headline: Draw a hot dog shape outline.
Draw an oval inside the rightmost part of your outline.
Color it.
steps.description: You can fill the shape with green fading to light yellowish-green as you paint to the left leaving the small oval white.

steps.headline: Paint some stripes starting from the small oval and fading when you get halfway.
Shade the lower portion with dark green.

text: Draw a hot dog shape outline.  Draw an oval inside the rightmost part of your outline.  Color it. You can fill the shape with green fading to light yellowish-green as you paint to the left leaving the small oval white. Paint some stripes starting from the small oval and fading when you get halfway.  Shade the lower portion with dark green. Create a shadow below it.
